verses.kjv: These words spake Jesus, and lifted up his eyes to heaven, and said, Father, the hour is come; glorify thy Son, that thy Son also may glorify thee:
verses.ct: After saying these things, Jesus looked up toward heaven and said, "Father, the time has come. Bring glory to your Son, so that your Son can bring glory to you.

verses.kjv: As thou hast given him power over all flesh, that he should give eternal life to as many as thou hast given him.
verses.ct: You gave him authority over all of humanity so that he could give eternal life to everyone you have entrusted to him.

verses.kjv: And this is life eternal, that they might know thee the only true God, and Jesus Christ, whom thou hast sent.
verses.ct: And this is eternal life: to know you, the only true God, and to know Jesus Christ, the one you sent.

verses.kjv: I have glorified thee on the earth: I have finished the work which thou gavest me to do.
verses.ct: I have brought you glory on the earth by completing the work you gave me to do.

verses.kjv: And now, O Father, glorify thou me with thine own self with the glory which I had with thee before the world was.
verses.ct: So now, Father, restore me to the glory I shared with you before the world existed.

verses.kjv: I have manifested thy name unto the men which thou gavest me out of the world: thine they were, and thou gavest them me; and they have kept thy word.
verses.ct: I have revealed who you are to the people you gave me out of the world. They belonged to you, and you entrusted them to me, and they have obeyed your word.

verses.kjv: Now they have known that all things whatsoever thou hast given me are of thee.
verses.ct: Now they understand that everything you have given me truly comes from you.

verses.kjv: For I have given unto them the words which thou gavest me; and they have received them, and have known surely that I came out from thee, and they have believed that thou didst send me.
verses.ct: I passed on to them the words you gave me, and they accepted them. They know with certainty that I came from you, and they believe that you sent me.

verses.kjv: I pray for them: I pray not for the world, but for them which thou hast given me; for they are thine.
verses.ct: I am praying for them. I am not praying for the world, but for the ones you have given me, because they belong to you.

verses.kjv: And all mine are thine, and thine are mine; and I am glorified in them.
verses.ct: Everything that is mine is yours, and everything that is yours is mine, and I am glorified through them.

verses.kjv: And now I am no more in the world, but these are in the world, and I come to thee. Holy Father, keep through thine own name those whom thou hast given me, that they may be one, as we are.
verses.ct: I will no longer be in the world, but they will remain in the world while I come to you. Holy Father, protect them by the power of your name — the ones you have given me — so that they may be united as one, just as we are one.

verses.kjv: While I was with them in the world, I kept them in thy name: those that thou gavest me I have kept, and none of them is lost, but the son of perdition; that the scripture might be fulfilled.
verses.ct: While I was with them in the world, I protected them by your name. I guarded the ones you gave me, and not one of them was lost except the one destined for destruction, so that Scripture would be fulfilled.

verses.kjv: And now come I to thee; and these things I speak in the world, that they might have my joy fulfilled in themselves.
verses.ct: Now I am coming to you, and I am saying these things while still in the world so that they may experience my joy completely within themselves.

verses.kjv: I have given them thy word; and the world hath hated them, because they are not of the world, even as I am not of the world.
verses.ct: I have given them your word, and the world has hated them because they don't belong to the world, just as I don't belong to the world.

verses.kjv: I pray not that thou shouldest take them out of the world, but that thou shouldest keep them from the evil.
verses.ct: I'm not asking you to remove them from the world, but to protect them from the evil one.

verses.kjv: They are not of the world, even as I am not of the world.
verses.ct: They don't belong to the world, just as I don't belong to the world.

verses.kjv: Sanctify them through thy truth: thy word is truth.
verses.ct: Set them apart by your truth — your word is truth.

verses.kjv: As thou hast sent me into the world, even so have I also sent them into the world.
verses.ct: In the same way that you sent me into the world, I have also sent them into the world.

verses.kjv: And for their sakes I sanctify myself, that they also might be sanctified through the truth.
verses.ct: For their sake, I set myself apart, so that they too may be truly set apart through the truth.

verses.kjv: Neither pray I for these alone, but for them also which shall believe on me through their word;
verses.ct: I'm not praying only for these disciples, but also for everyone who will put their faith in me because of their message.

verses.kjv: That they all may be one; as thou, Father, art in me, and I in thee, that they also may be one in us: that the world may believe that thou hast sent me.
verses.ct: I pray that all of them will be united as one — just as you, Father, are in me and I am in you — so that they also may be one in us, and the world will believe that you sent me.

verses.kjv: And the glory which thou gavest me I have given them; that they may be one, even as we are one:
verses.ct: I have given them the same glory you gave me, so that they may be united as one, just as we are one.

verses.kjv: I in them, and thou in me, that they may be made perfect in one; and that the world may know that thou hast sent me, and hast loved them, as thou hast loved me.
verses.ct: I am in them and you are in me, so that they may reach complete unity. Then the world will recognize that you sent me and that you have loved them just as you have loved me.

verses.kjv: Father, I will that they also, whom thou hast given me, be with me where I am; that they may behold my glory, which thou hast given me: for thou lovedst me before the foundation of the world.
verses.ct: Father, my desire is that those you have given me would be with me where I am, so they can see my glory — the glory you gave me because you loved me before the creation of the world.

verses.kjv: O righteous Father, the world hath not known thee: but I have known thee, and these have known that thou hast sent me.
verses.ct: Righteous Father, the world does not know you, but I know you, and these disciples know that you sent me.

verses.kjv: And I have declared unto them thy name, and will declare it: that the love wherewith thou hast loved me may be in them, and I in them.
verses.ct: I have made your name known to them, and I will continue to make it known, so that the love you have for me will be in them, and I myself will be in them."
